content: IntroductionWelcome to the most exciting cricket Contest of the year! The ICC Men's World Cup 2023 is around the corner, and we're thrilled to bring you an electrifying contest that will test your cricketing knowledge and prediction skills. Predict, strategize, and compete with fellow cricket enthusiasts for a chance to win incredible prizes!General Rules1: Using a point-based system, we will select the top 10 earners. 2: No Registration Fees required. Rank above junior is required to participate in the contest3: Stay engaged throughout the tournament and Increase your points by predicting daily.4: IT IS PROHIBITED TO EDIT YOUR POST. This can lead to disqualification. 5: Please submit your predictions before the start of the Match. We will not count the points once the match starts. comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on September 18, 2023, 03:32:09 PMThanks , I remembered your IPL contest which was much better and I hope this will be big one too. Welcome mate, doors are open for everyone.I am a bit confused as how will you keep track of all the matches and the entries by the people. All of the old contests used the third party site superbru and every calculation was automatic and managed by that site.Let's suppose you have 20 members participating and each member will give his prediction about the match wins, toss and other stuff. Wouldn't it be a headache to manually update all these stats?Also, you need to be online at all times, to check the member's predictions and verify them (by quoting or any other means so no one can edit their posts and change the values). I really do not understand how this will be managed yet to ensure transparency.
